item.description:
I am going to see the movie Milk with Sean Penn on Friday Jan.9th. The movie starts at 6:35 so I thought we could meet around 6:10 in the front lobby. The movie is actually playing at Showcase Art which is part of Showcase North.
I hope some of you can make it to this movie. See you there.
Cindy
item.how_to_find_us: I have long red hair and I will be out in the front lobby

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: See the Movie Milk
